The most effective web scraping company

Looking to harvest valuable data from a target website to empower your business?
From product prices on retailer websites, Amazon, suppliers, ...
To contact list on directories, yellow pages, search engines, ...
Or profiles on social medias.

Our goal is to help you pull exactly what you need into structured databases, spreadsheets.

The scraped data will be double checked for quality and accuracy, by both automated system and human as well.

Why choose exactdata.io?

If you are looking for the best quality with affordable price, exactdata.io is a reliable choice. We have great talents and experiences to deliver.

Following are some more benefits when working with us:

  • Meet your requirements: We use Python-based framework, not generic software, so we can perfectly adapt to your need.
  • Fast turnaround: you can expect results within 1-2 days, for a basic web scraping task.
  • Scalable: with millions of proxies and cloud-based servers, we can scrape thousands of sites at the same time.
  • Money back guarantee: No good data, no payment at all. Plus, we only require 20% upfront payment, making it easy to start.
  • Success proven: See what people said about us on Upwork.

Our web scraping abilities:

  • Scrape product pricing data from e-commerce websites.
  • Create product data feeds from a target website.
  • Compare product prices accross websites.
  • Monitor pricing changes for given websites
  • Scrape contact leads from yellow pages, directories, Google etc.
  • Or to scrape whatever you can see on a website.

Workflow: safe and simple

Requirement Disucssion

First thing first, we'd love to chat with you to understand your need clearly.

Job Processing

Our web scraping experts will build a custom web scraper (bot, crawler) to pull all required data.
Again, the scraped data must be double checked for quality and accuracy.

Payment

No satisfaction, no payment. To save both of us valuable time, we want to make sure the results are perfect at the first version.
